attributes.action: The British Prime Minister Theresa May must step down from her Post Immediately
attributes.additional_details:
cont: on her Dreadful Redlines!!!

Surely this a Major Conflict of interest in the Brexit Referendum the PM Campaigned Strongly to Remain in the EU but as PM she is having to Debate a Deal to Leave the EU 

She has been campaigning to eliminate the Human Rights Act (HRA) and detach Britain from the European Court of Human Rights (EcTHR). She has not shown a single line of what that Bill of Rights would say!!  

She just wants power and she could well become worse than Margaret Thatcher.
attributes.background: Since taking Office on 13/07/16 she has caused utter chaos, Reduced Police Officers & intern Crimes has Severely Increased, She is the 1st EVER PM to put a Political Party into "Contempt of Parliament",  with her Red Lines regards Brexit & while now Negotiating with Labour she still wont budge, cont

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions which call for someone to lose their job. This includes government Ministers.
